name: Golden Forest Homestay
address: Phong Nha town, Son Trach commune, Bo Trach district, Quang Binh province, Phong Nha, Việt Nam
description:
Golden Forest Homestay nằm ở Phong Nha và có phòng chờ chung. Tại đây có sân hiên và khách có thể sử dụng Wi-Fi miễn phí và chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí.

Khách tại khách sạn có thể thưởng thức bữa sáng kiểu Á.

Leo núi là hoạt động được ưa chuộng trong khu vực. Ngoài ra, Golden Forest Homestay có dịch vụ thuê ô tô.

Thành thạo tiếng Anh và tiếng Việt, đội ngũ nhân viên tại lễ tân luôn sẵn lòng hỗ trợ khách vào bất kỳ thời điểm nào trong ngày.

Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Đồng Hới, cách chỗ nghỉ 38 km, đồng thời chỗ nghỉ có cung cấp dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay mất phí.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Gia đình
review.comment_positive: Phòng mới, sạch sẽ, gia chủ nhiệt tình

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Địa điểm tốt . Sạch sẽ . Chủ nhà dễ thương nhiệt tình

review.room_type: Phòng 3 Người Có Phòng Tắm Riêng
review.comment_positive: Khách sạn sạch sẽ, chủ nhà dễ thương, rất gần bến thuyền đi động Phong Nha

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive: It was very clean, in the middle of the city Center (if you can call it that), the host was suuper friendly and amazing- she really made our stay! My friend got food poisoned and she Asked us every day how she was feeling, said she could drive her to the hospital for free, buy or make food, or go to the Pharmacy to buy medication. She helped us with everything and was always smiling! The best host I’ve had without a doubt. She will fix anything for you. The breakfast was homemade and really good, we even got breakfast after the breakfast hour without asking, and when we took the bus early in the morning she had Made us chicken baguettes. Rooms were clean and cosy. Would stay here again!

review.room_type: Phòng 3 Người Có Phòng Tắm Riêng
review.comment_positive: Really great, clean property. The owners are very kind and helpful. Did one of the tours they sold and it was great and way cheaper than online. 10/10 would stay again.

review.room_type: Phòng 3 Người Có Phòng Tắm Riêng
review.comment_positive: Very good location...very good people..very helpful

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive: The room was spacious, clean and very comfortable. It had a/c and also had an electric fan on the roof which was a nice touch for when the a/c was too cold. The host was absolutely fantastic! She was so kind and very welcoming. She booked a tour of the caves for us and our bus to Hanoi both at very short notice. Our bus didn’t leave Phong Nha until late at night, but the host gave us the use of the room during the day to leave our bags and shower even after we had checked out which was amazing. We would not hesitate to stay here again.

review.rating: Perfect little homestay to relax in after hiking in Phong Nha!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive: This little homestay in Phong Nha was perfect and very inexpensive for all the amenities it provided. It is located centrally and is within walking distance of restaurants and attractions. The bedroom and bathroom were modern and very very clean. The bed was cozy, the WiFi was strong, the air conditioner was very cooling, and the decor/lights were very relaxing. The staff were sweet, friendly, and accommodating. My overnight bus from Ninh Binh arrived at 3am and I was able to contact the staff at that hour and be immediately checked in! My bus back to Hanoi left at 9pm and I was also able to check out that late. I had tons of privacy (unlike in a hostel) which was ideal for me. I would stay here again in a heart beat and recommend it to everyone.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Staff members were accommodating for early check in and check out at 4am in the morning
review.comment_negative: Breakfast advertised in the description however they have not been doing this since Covid-19. Description needs updating to avoid disappointment as this hotel was booked for my friends birthday.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: We thought this homestay was good but not excellent. It's a simple room with a simple bathroom but definately okay for a couple of days in Phong Nha. The owner rented us scooters for a fair price and was really happy all the time, although there was an occational language barrier. If were to choose again we might have gone with a farmstay for the experience.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Gia đình
review.comment_positive: Phòng mới, sạch sẽ, gia chủ nhiệt tình
